title: Pixel Component Definition
description: Addressable Pixel WipperSnapper component for use in Adafruit IO

displayName.description: The human-friendly name of this component.

pixelType.description: The type of addressable pixel: WS2812 (neopixel) or APA201 (dotstar).

defaultNumPixels.description: If present, the component form will allow the user to set the number of pixels in the strand, with this value as the default.

defaultPixelBrightness.description: If present, the component form will allow the user to set the pixel strand's brightness, with this value as the default.

autoSelectString.description: A hint for automatically looking up pin names that may be appropriate for this kind of component.
